synopsis: Akira Onno ends up in another world of his own creation where he runs into a filthy girl shunned from her village who ends up calling him Demon Lord.
When one of the three Holy Maidens comes to dispatch the Demon Lord, Kunai is forced to resort to some old-fashioned discipline.
Luna's wild sister comes to take her away. But when trouble shows up to ruin everything, a new face comes to save the day.
Kunai summons one of his underlings who lends Aku a helping hand. But being who it is, they may end up being more than he can handle.
On their way to the Holy Capital, the party runs into a small village with big problems and decides to take matters into their own hands.
While having a pleasant dinner banquet for Aku in the Holy Capital, the celebration is cut short by a dangerous cult with a thirst for blood.
As the Holy Castle comes under attack, the defenders get in over their heads. Kunai opts to send his replacement to take on the troublesome Demon.
After investigating the Seraph in the Holy Capital, Kunai and crew jump back to Rabby Village to get his money-making scheme underway.
In order to prepare the hot spring resort for business, Kunai earns some much-needed funds by taking advantage of a merchant who doesn't know any better.
Luna tries to impress Madam Shrimpfry with a tour of the hot spring resort. Later on, Aku, Luna, Yu, and Tron all compete for Kunai's attention.
Kunai falls victim to Yukikaze's attack while on the hunt for information. Meanwhile, Angel takes it upon herself to rescue her little sister.
During a surprise confrontation in the outdoor bath, Angel White finds out Kunai may be more than meets the eye.
